EmailTemplate.name: 17-BG-SSE-Email-SSE SBC prod nurture2-T0025N.SSE_SBC_3_SP_Data_Sheet
EmailTemplate.subject: How to secure your media and signaling streams
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Nokia SBC data sheet Secure your media and signaling streams Voice over LTE (VoLTE) and other IP-based services are creating a rapidly evolving and more challenging communications infrastructure. As a result, it’s more important than ever to secure and control the media and signaling streams that cross your network’s edge.
The Nokia Session Border Controller (SBC) offers a best-in-class cloud-native solution to address these needs. Let us show you why.
In this data sheet, learn more about the latest release of Nokia SBC, including:
- Key features and benefits - Deployment options, from cloud-integrated to commercial off-the-shelf (COTS) - Technical specifications Enjoy! Brendan Ziolo Head of Secure Service Enablement, Nokia Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia’s networks business or its third-party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
